author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zions Bancorp Says As Part Of Previously Announced Internal Reorganization, Co Entered Into Deal, Plan Of Merger With Wholly Owned Bank Unit, ZB, N.A.
text:
April 10 (Reuters) - Zions Bancorp:
* ZIONS BANCORP - AS PART OF PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED INTERNAL REORGANIZATION, CO ENTERED INTO DEAL, PLAN OF MERGER WITH WHOLLY-OWNED BANK UNIT, ZB, N.A.
* ZIONS BANCORP SAYS ON APRIL 05, UNDER TERMS OF PLAN OF MERGER, CO WILL BE MERGED WITH AND INTO UNIT, WITH UNIT CONTINUING AS SURVIVING ENTITY Source text: ( bit.ly/2GNIPjs ) Further company coverage:
